product_name: Shebeest Bellissima Solid Bike Jersey - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The Shebeest Bellisima plus-size bike jersey has a casual fit and technical fabric to keep you cool, comfortable and looking great! Soft polyester fabric wicks moisture away from the skin and remains comfortable during long rides. Generous 11-in. front zipper lets you control ventilation. Collar and sleeve hems are finished with a contrast binding for a chafe-free workout. 2 rear pockets keep your essentials close yet out of the way.
short_description: The Shebeest Bellisima plus-size bike jersey has a casual fit and technical fabric to keep you cool, comfortable and looking great!
